thread.title: Storm Alert: Brace for a Wild Ride of Rain, Thunder, and Chilling Temps
thread.title_full: Storm Alert: Brace for a Wild Ride of Rain, Thunder, and Chilling Temps

author: newsdirectory3
title: Storm Alert: Brace for a Wild Ride of Rain, Thunder, and Chilling Temps
text:
Weather Forecast for ​November 1, 2024 Today,⁤ Friday, November 1, 2024, the northern part of the country⁣ is experiencing unstable weather ⁤conditions, with a slight drop in temperature accompanied ‍by rains of varying intensity and occasional‌ thunderstorms.
Regional Weather Forecast According to Mahmoud Shaheen, Director General of Weather Forecasting and Early Warning of Weather Hazards,⁣ there​ is a possibility of light rain in the evening in Greater Cairo, which may⁢ be⁣ moderate at times. Additionally, light rain, which may be moderate‍ and accompanied by occasional thunderstorms,⁣ is⁢ expected⁤ in Menofia, Sharqiya,⁣ and Ismailia regions.​ Matrouh and Alexandria may experience moderate to heavy⁤ rain , with occasional thundershowers. Light⁣ rain is ⁤also expected in El-Sheikh, Dakahlia, and⁤ Gharbia,‌ which may ⁢be moderate and accompanied ​by thunder at​ times. ⁤Furthermore, Damietta⁤ and Port Said ⁣areas may experience light ‍rain, ‌which may be ⁣moderate and accompanied by thunder.​ Halayeb and Shalatin may also experience ‌light rain, which may be moderate and accompanied by‌ thunder.
Temperature Forecast The expected temperatures ‌for Friday ​are as follows:‌ Greater Cairo (25°C ​high, 18°C low), Alexandria (24°C ‌high, 21°C low), Matrouh ‍(23°C high, 20°C low), Sohag (27°C high, 16°C low), Qena‌ (29°C high, 16°C ​low),⁤ and Aswan (29°C high, 17°C low).
